metadata.title: CVE-2024-27077 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:v4l2-mem2mem: fix a memleak in v4l2_m2m_register_entity The entity->name(i.e. name) is allocated in v4l2_m2m_register_entity but isn't freed in itsfollowing error-handling paths. This patch adds such deallocation toprevent memleak of entity->name.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
